Uses of Class
com.joliciel.talismane.posTagger.PosTag

  • Packages that use PosTag 
    Package Description
    com.joliciel.talismane.lexicon
    Interfaces and generic classes for handling lexicons, which are used in Talismane within various tokeniser, pos-tagger and parser features and rules, as well as for certain types of filters (e.g.
    com.joliciel.talismane.parser.output
    Package for outputting parser results.
    com.joliciel.talismane.posTagger
    Package enabling the part-of-speech tagging of a TokenSequence.
    The central class is the PosTagger.
    com.joliciel.talismane.posTagger.features
    Various features specific to the pos-tagging phase.
    The available feature descriptors are listed in PosTaggerFeatureParser.addFeatureClasses(com.joliciel.talismane.machineLearning.features.FeatureClassContainer)
    com.joliciel.talismane.tokeniser
    Tokenisation package.

      Fields in com.joliciel.talismane.posTagger declared as PosTag 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static PosTag PosTag.NULL_POS_TAG
      A null pos tag, to be used for empty tokens that should be discarded.
      static PosTag PosTag.ROOT_POS_TAG
      An artificial pos-tag used to indicate the artificial root added to all sentences for parsing.
